name: Ninja

skills.name: Shatterbolt
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 45% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. Also fills this Champion's Turn Meter by 15% when used against Bosses.

effects.notes: Single hit, 3.7 ATK multiplier. 45%→60% chance (booked) to place 60% Decrease DEF for 2 turns.
45% base chance (60% when booked) to place 60% Decrease DEF for 2 turns. CRITICAL debuff for team damage.
Fills Ninja's TM by 15% when used against BOSSES ONLY. Does NOT trigger vs waves. Enables faster cycling for passive stacking.

skills.notes: Turn Meter fill ONLY triggers against bosses. Passive 'Escalation' requires all 3 skills (A1, A2, A3) to land on same target in one ROUND for stacking (not per turn - one round = all champions take turns once).

skills.name: Hailburn
skills.description: Attacks 3 times at random. Each hit has a 75% chance of placing [HP Burn] debuff for 3 turns. Also places a [Perfect Veil] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. When used against Bosses, will instantly activate any [HP Burn] debuffs, including [HP Burn] debuffs placed by this Skill.

effects.notes: Triple random hit, 2.0 ATK multiplier per hit (6.0 total if all hit same target). 75%→100% chance (booked) per hit to place HP Burn for 3 turns.
75% base chance (100% when booked) per hit to place HP Burn for 3 turns. Up to 3 HP Burns if all hit same target (though only 1 active, extras reset duration).
Places Perfect Veil on Ninja for 2 turns. Perfect Veil = CANNOT be targeted by enemies (better than normal Veil which is 50% chance to avoid targeting). Critical for survivability in waves.

When used against BOSSES, instantly activates ALL HP Burn debuffs on ALL enemies (not just from this skill - ANY HP Burn source). UNIQUE MECHANIC - only Ninja has this. Each HP Burn activation = 2.5% enemy MAX HP damage (ignores DEF). With 3 HP Burns placed by A2 + HP Burn from teammates (e.g., Drexthar, Geomancer, Mortu-Macaab), can instantly deal 10%+ enemy MAX HP damage. CRITICAL for Spider, CB, all boss content.

skills.book_value: +15% damage, +25% debuff chance (75%→100% per hit), -1 CD (4→3 turns)
skills.notes: SIGNATURE SKILL. Only champion in RAID with HP Burn ACTIVATION. When targeting boss, instantly activates ALL HP Burn debuffs for massive damage (2.5% enemy MAX HP per HP Burn, ignores DEF). Perfect Veil protects Ninja for 2 turns. MUST book to 100% HP Burn chance and 3-turn CD.

skills.name: Cyan Slash
skills.description: Attacks all enemies. Has a 75% chance of placing a [Freeze] debuff for 1 turn. When targeting a Boss, will only attack the Boss (not all enemies) and will ignore 50% of the target's DEF. Will also decrease the cooldown of the Hailburn skill by 1 turn.

effects.notes: AOE attack, 3.0 ATK multiplier. 75%→100% chance (booked) to Freeze all enemies for 1 turn. WAVE CLEAR MODE.
75% base chance (100% when booked) to Freeze all enemies for 1 turn. Freeze = enemy cannot take turn (strongest CC).
VS BOSSES: Single target attack, 3.95 ATK multiplier. IGNORES 50% of boss DEF. BOSS MODE - changes from AOE to single-target.
VS BOSSES ONLY: Reduces Hailburn (A2) cooldown by 1 turn. Enables faster A2 cycling for HP Burn spam + activation.

skills.book_value: +15% damage, +25% debuff chance (75%→100% Freeze), -1 CD (5→4 turns)
skills.notes: DUAL MODE SKILL. VS WAVES: AOE Freeze (crowd control). VS BOSSES: Single-target high damage (3.95 ATK, ignores 50% DEF) + reduces A2 cooldown by 1 turn (enables A2 spam). MUST book to 100% Freeze chance and 4-turn CD.

skills.name: Escalation
skills.description: Increases Ninja's ATK by 10% (up to 100%) and C.DMG% (up to 25%) each time a single enemy is hit by all three of Ninja's Active Skills in a single Round. This effect can occur multiple times against the same enemy. When fighting Bosses, will increase Ninja's ATK by 20% (up to 100%) and C.DMG by 10% (up to 25%) instead.

effects.notes: VS WAVES: +10% ATK per stack (max 10 stacks = +100% ATK total). Stacks when A1, A2, A3 all land on SAME enemy in ONE ROUND.
VS WAVES: +2.5% C.DMG per stack (max 10 stacks = +25% C.DMG total). Stacks when A1, A2, A3 all land on SAME enemy in ONE ROUND.
VS BOSSES: +20% ATK per stack (max 5 stacks = +100% ATK total). Stacks FASTER than waves (20% vs 10%). Stacks when A1, A2, A3 all land on boss in ONE ROUND.
VS BOSSES: +10% C.DMG per stack (max 3 stacks = +25% C.DMG total, math: 10+10+5=25). Stacks FASTER than waves (10% vs 2.5%). Stacks when A1, A2, A3 all land on boss in ONE ROUND.

skills.notes: CRITICAL PASSIVE for boss damage scaling. Requires A1, A2, A3 to ALL hit SAME target in ONE ROUND (not turn - round = full rotation of all champions). VS BOSSES: stacks FASTER (20% ATK, 10% C.DMG per stack vs 10% ATK, 2.5% C.DMG for waves). Max stacks: +100% ATK, +25% C.DMG. Typical CB fight: reaches max stacks by turn 5-7 = massive damage scaling. Use A1→A2→A3 rotation on boss for fastest stacking.

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: 100% C.RATE (non-negotiable), 220+ SPD (speed tune dependent), 250+ ACC (UNM), C.DMG 200%+, ATK 3,500+ (pre-passive stacking). Passive adds +100% ATK at max stacks = effective 7,000+ ATK. Warmaster procs from A1 (single-hit, 60% chance). Giant Slayer procs from A2 (triple-hit, ~66% total chance = 30% per hit × 3 hits). Recommend Warmaster OR Giant Slayer depending on build focus.

recommended_gear: CLAN BOSS (UNM): Lifesteal + Speed OR Lifesteal + Accuracy sets. 100% C.RATE (CRITICAL), 220+ SPD (speed tune dependent - 171-191 for Budget Unkillable, 220+ for Counterattack), 250+ ACC (UNM debuff landing), C.DMG 200%+, ATK 3,500+ (pre-passive). Typical speed tunes: Budget Unkillable (171-191 SPD), Counterattack (220+ SPD), Myth-Heir (specific speeds). MUST book A2 (100% HP Burn) and A3 (4-turn CD + 100% Freeze). Warmaster OR Giant Slayer (see masteries notes). Typical CB damage: 10-20M (early game), 20-40M (mid-game with good gear), 40-60M+ (end-game with max stacks + good team). HP Burn activation deals 2.5% enemy MAX HP per burn (ignores DEF) - with 3 HP Burns from A2 = instant 7.5% MAX HP damage (~3M on UNM CB).

CLAN BOSS (Relentless build - advanced): Relentless + Speed/Accuracy sets for extra turns (enables A2 spam for HP Burn activation). Requires VERY high ACC (250+), 100% C.RATE, 220+ SPD, C.DMG 200%+. Relentless 18% chance per turn for extra turn = can use A2 twice in one rotation for double HP Burn activation. High-risk, high-reward build for max CB damage (50M+ potential). Requires excellent gear and speed tuning to avoid breaking rotation.

DUNGEONS (Dragon 25, Spider 25, Ice Golem 25, Fire Knight 25): Lifesteal + Speed OR Savage + Cruel sets (nuker build). Dragon/Spider: HP Burn activation (A2) deals massive damage to boss. Spider: Pair with AOE HP Burn champions (Drexthar, Geomancer, Mordecai, Ultimate Galek) for maximum A2 value. Fire Knight: A1 Decrease DEF + A3 single-target damage (ignores 50% DEF). Ice Golem: A3 Freeze for wave control. Build: 100% C.RATE, 220+ SPD, 250+ ACC, C.DMG 200%+, ATK 3,500+. Typical clear times: Dragon 1:30-2:30, Spider 1:00-2:00 (with HP Burn team), FK 2:00-3:00, IG 2:00-3:00.

DOOM TOWER (All Bosses - Celestial Griffin, Dark Fae, Eternal Dragon, Scarab, Bommal, Nether Spider, etc.): Lifesteal + Perception/Accuracy sets for survivability + ACC. 100% C.RATE, 220+ SPD, 350+ ACC (Hard DT), C.DMG 200%+, ATK 3,500+, HP 50,000+ (Hard survivability). HP Burn activation (A2) is CRITICAL for all bosses. Celestial Griffin: Top-tier (HP Burn activation spam). Bommal Dreadhorn: A3 Freeze prevents Dreadbombs from counterattacking (reduces damage by 50%). Scarab King: HP Burn bypasses shield. Nether Spider: A3 Freeze prevents spiderling counterattacks. Dark Fae: HP Burn activation before she reaches 5 dark energy.

ARENA (Nuker build): Savage + Cruel sets for maximum damage (ignore DEF + extra C.DMG). 100% C.RATE, 250+ SPD (speed tune for nuker role after booster), 250+ ACC (A3 Freeze), C.DMG 250%+, ATK 4,000+. Typical rotation: Speed booster (High Khatun, Arbiter) → Decrease DEF (Warmaiden, Stag Knight) → Ninja A3 (AOE Freeze + damage) → Ninja A2 (if needed for cleanup). Works in Gold 3-5 Arena. NOTE: Passive stacking NOT reliable in Arena (fights too short). Build for burst damage, not passive scaling.

FACTION WARS (Shadowkin): Lifesteal + Speed sets for survivability. 100% C.RATE, 220+ SPD, 250+ ACC, C.DMG 200%+, ATK 3,500+, HP 40,000+ (survivability). A3 Freeze for wave control, A2 HP Burn + activation for boss stages. Passive stacking enables solo carry potential for Shadowkin faction (Ninja can 1v5 bosses after max stacks). User Shadowkin faction progress unknown.

NOTE: 100% C.RATE is NON-NEGOTIABLE for Ninja. Passive stacking scales ATK and C.DMG, so crit-based damage is CRITICAL. Lifesteal is recommended for all PVE content except Arena (enables sustainability for long fights). Savage + Cruel for Arena nuker build (ignore DEF + C.DMG). Relentless for advanced CB builds (extra turns for A2 spam). Perception/Accuracy sets for ACC breakpoints (250+ UNM CB, 350+ Hard DT).

blessings: Brimstone (All Content): +30% HP Burn damage. Ninja is HP Burn specialist - A2 places HP Burn + instantly activates. Brimstone boosts HP Burn tick damage from 2.5% enemy MAX HP to 3.25% enemy MAX HP (30% increase). BEST general-purpose blessing for Ninja. Synergizes with HP Burn activation mechanic.

Phantom Touch (Clan Boss): Extends debuff duration by 1 turn on buff/debuff application (25% chance). Synergizes with HP Burn and Decrease DEF - extends 3→4 turns even without Master Hexer. BEST for CB UNM (more HP Burn uptime = more A2 activation value). Alternative to Brimstone for CB-focused builds.
Cruelty (Dungeons/Doom Tower): +12% damage to debuffed enemies. Ninja applies HP Burn + Decrease DEF - always benefits. Good for general dungeon use when Brimstone is not available.
NOTE: Brimstone is BEST general-purpose blessing (HP Burn damage boost). Phantom Touch is BEST for Clan Boss (debuff extension). Cruelty is general-purpose backup.

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: Generally GOOD AI. Prioritizes bosses correctly. Uses A2 (Hailburn) and A3 (Cyan Slash) appropriately. NO MAJOR ISSUES. Perfect Veil from A2 prevents targeting, so AI can't misuse skills while protected. Minor issue: A3 uses AOE on waves (correct) but switches to single-target on boss (correct) - AI handles dual mode well.

cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: Ninja's A2 'Hailburn' HP Burn ACTIVATION is a UNIQUE mechanic in RAID Shadow Legends (only champion with this ability). When used against BOSSES, A2 instantly activates ALL HP Burn debuffs on ALL enemies, dealing 2.5% enemy MAX HP damage per HP Burn (ignores DEF). This bypasses DEF scaling and enables massive burst damage against any boss regardless of stats. With multiple HP Burn sources (Drexthar, Geomancer, Mortu-Macaab, Mordecai, Ultimate Galek, etc.), Ninja can instantly deal 10-15%+ enemy MAX HP damage per A2 use. This makes Ninja meta-defining for Spider, Clan Boss, and all boss content.

specific_comps_and_synergies.mechanics: Ninja places 3 HP Burns with A2 (100% chance when booked) and instantly activates them for 7.5% CB MAX HP damage (~3M on UNM). Geomancer's passive places HP Burn via A3 + passive reflection. Master Hexer mastery extends HP Burns from 3→4 turns (50% more uptime). Typical rotation: Geomancer A3 (HP Burn on CB) → Ninja A2 (activate + place 3 more HP Burns + activate instantly) → repeat. Passive 'Escalation' stacks +20% ATK, +10% C.DMG per round (max 5 stacks = +100% ATK, +25% C.DMG by turn 5-7). Typical CB damage: 10-20M (early game), 20-40M (mid-game), 40-60M+ (end-game with max stacks).
specific_comps_and_synergies.notes: Ninja is S-tier for CB UNM (10/10 rating). MUST book A2 (100% HP Burn) and A3 (4-turn CD). Speed tune: 171-191 (Budget Unkillable), 220+ (Counterattack), specific speeds (Myth-Heir). Giant Slayer OR Warmaster (both viable). Relentless set advanced build (18% extra turn = double A2 activation for 50M+ damage).

champions: AOE HP Burn (Drexthar, Ultimate Galek, Mordecai, Achak + Sicia)
specific_comps_and_synergies.mechanics: AOE HP Burn champions place HP Burn on ALL spiderlings + mother spider. Ninja A2 instantly activates ALL HP Burn debuffs for massive AOE damage (2.5% MAX HP × 10-20 enemies = 25-50% total enemy team MAX HP damage per A2 use). A3 Freeze prevents spiderling counterattacks. Typical clear time: 1:00-2:00 (with good HP Burn team). Ninja often top damage dealer (40-60% of team damage).
specific_comps_and_synergies.notes: Ninja is top-tier for Spider 25 (10/10 rating). Pair with AOE HP Burn champs for maximum A2 value. Perfect Veil from A2 protects Ninja from spiderling targeting. A3 Freeze for crowd control.
